messages.content: How do I install the ComfyUI Visual Anagrams plugin?
You can install the plugin by cloning the repository into the ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory using `git clone https://github.com/zcfrank1st/comfyui_visual_anagrams.git`.
Can you provide an example of how the ComfyUI Visual Anagrams plugin works?
Yes, an example can be found in the plugin documentation. The workflow example is represented by the image `./sample.png`.
Is there an animate node included in the ComfyUI Visual Anagrams plugin yet?
No, there is currently no animate node included in the plugin. However, it is listed as a TODO item, indicating that it may be added in the future.
